tar æ‰“åŒ…ã€è§£åŒ…é è¨­æ“ä½œä½¿ç”¨ç›¸å°è·¯å¾‘ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨çµ•å°è·¯å¾‘è·¯å¾‘éœ€åŠ ä¸Š -P, --absolute-paths åƒæ•¸

#!/bin/bash
# æ‰“åŒ… foo/ è³‡æ–™å¤¾ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰æª”æ¡ˆ
tar -c -v -f foo.tar foo/

# è§£åŒ…

# æŸ¥çœ‹åŒ…
tar -t -v -f foo.tar

-c, --create:
    create a new ARCHIVE

-x, --extract: 
    extract files from an ARCHIVE
    
-t, --list
    list the contents of an ARCHIVE

-f, --file=ARCHIVE:
    use ARCHIVE file or device ARCHIVE

-v, --verbose: 
    verbosely list files processed

.tar.gz

item.description: ä½¿ç”¨ man æŒ‡ä»¤æ™‚ï¼Œå®¹æ˜“å› ç‚ºç›¸ä¼¼æª”æ¡ˆæˆ–æŒ‡ä»¤è€Œå°è‡´çœ‹éŒ¯æ‰‹å†Šï¼Œèˆ‰å€‹ä¾‹å­åƒæ˜¯ passwd é€™åŒæ™‚æœ‰æŒ‡ä»¤ /usr/bin/passwd çš„æ‰‹å†Šï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯æª”æ¡ˆ /etc/passwd çš„æ‰‹å†Š é€™æ™‚éœ€è¦æŸ¥ä¸€ä¸‹æœ‰å“ªäº› manual # æŸ¥æ‰‹å†Šåå­—ä¸­
item.content:
ä½¿ç”¨ man æŒ‡ä»¤æ™‚ï¼Œå®¹æ˜“å› ç‚ºç›¸ä¼¼æª”æ¡ˆæˆ–æŒ‡ä»¤è€Œå°è‡´çœ‹éŒ¯æ‰‹å†Šï¼Œèˆ‰å€‹ä¾‹å­åƒæ˜¯ passwd

é€™åŒæ™‚æœ‰æŒ‡ä»¤ /usr/bin/passwd çš„æ‰‹å†Šï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯æª”æ¡ˆ /etc/passwd çš„æ‰‹å†Š

é€™æ™‚éœ€è¦æŸ¥ä¸€ä¸‹æœ‰å“ªäº› manual

# æŸ¥æ‰‹å†Šåå­—ä¸­æœ‰ `passwd` çš„æ‰‹å†Š
man -f passwd

# æŸ¥æ‰‹å†Šåå­—ä¸­åŒ…å« `passwd` çš„æ‰‹å†Š
man -k passwd
## output
# passwd (1)           - change user password
# passwd (5)           - the password file

-f: 
    same as whatis(1). 
    Search for all words in expression in manual page names only.
-k:
    same as apropos(1). 
    Support the full expression syntax. The search is case-insensitive and matches whole words only.

æ­¤æ™‚æœƒé¡¯ç¤ºè·Ÿ passwd ç›¸é—œçš„æ‰‹å†Šï¼Œæ‹¬è™Ÿä¸­çš„æ•¸å­—è¡¨ç¤ºæ‰‹å†Šçš„ section

Manual Sections
the sections of the manual are:

    1. General commands (executable programs or shell commands)
    2. System calls (functions provided by the kernel)
    3. Library functions (functions within program libraries)
    4. Kernel interfaces
    5. File formats and conventions
    6. Games
    7. Miscellaneous information (including macro packages and conventions)
    8. System manager's
    8. system administration commands (usually only for root)
    9. Kernel developer's
    9. kernel routines [non standard]

ä¸Šè¿°ä¾‹å­è¼¸å‡ºé—œæ–¼ passwd çš„çµæœï¼Œsession 1 æ˜¯æŒ‡ä»¤çš„æ‰‹å†Šï¼Œsession 5 æ˜¯æª”æ¡ˆçš„æ‰‹å†Š

man 1 passwd

æƒ³çœ‹æª”æ¡ˆçš„æ‰‹å†Šçš„è©±

man 5 passwd

item.content:
Laravel æœ‰è¨±å¤š Logger Driver å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ Slack ç•¶ä½œæ˜¯è¨˜éŒ„ Log çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œåªè¦å®Œæˆç›¸é—œçš„è¨­å®šï¼ŒåŸºæœ¬ä¸Šå°±å®Œæˆä¸²æ¥äº†

è¨­å®š Laravel

config/logging.php

<?php # config/logging.php

return [

    'default' => env('LOG_CHANNEL', 'stack'),

    'channels' => [
        'stack' => [
            'driver' => 'stack',
            'channels' => ['daily', 'slack'], // <= æ–°å¢ slack
            'ignore_exceptions' => false,
        ],

        // Slack ç”¨é è¨­çš„è¨­å®š
        'slack' => [
            'driver' => 'slack',
            'url' => env('LOG_SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL'),
            'username' => 'Laravel Log',
            'emoji' => 'ğŸ’¥',
            'level' => 'critical',
        ],
        
        // ...
    ],
];

Status Code 429

429 Too Many The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time (“rate limiting”).

æ„æ€æ˜¯åœ¨é™åˆ¶çš„æ™‚é–“å…§ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨è€…ç™¼å‡ºå¤ªå¤šçš„è«‹æ±‚äº†

ä»€éº¼éƒ½æ²’æœ‰è¨­å®šçš„è©±ï¼Œé è¨­åœ¨ app/Http/Kernel.php ä¸­ï¼Œæœƒé™åˆ¶ 1 åˆ†é˜åªèƒ½è«‹æ±‚ 60 æ¬¡

<?php // app/Http/Kernel.php
class Kernel {

item.title: [Tools] åˆªé™¤å¤šå€‹ GitHub Repositories
item.description: åœ¨æˆ‘çš„ GitHub ä¸­æœ‰è¨±å¤šåƒåœ¾ Repositories æ˜¯éœ€è¦è¢«åˆªé™¤çš„ï¼Œæ‰‹å‹•é»æ“Šç•«é¢ä¸Šçš„æ­¥é©Ÿå¤ªç¹ç‘£ã€å¤ªç´¯äºº … GitHub æœ‰æä¾› api æ–¹å¼å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œé€™æ¬¡ä½¿ç”¨ shell script æ–¹å¼åˆªé™¤ ä¸ä¸€å®šè¦ä½¿ç”¨ shell scri
item.content:
åœ¨æˆ‘çš„ GitHub ä¸­æœ‰è¨±å¤šåƒåœ¾ Repositories æ˜¯éœ€è¦è¢«åˆªé™¤çš„ï¼Œæ‰‹å‹•é»æ“Šç•«é¢ä¸Šçš„æ­¥é©Ÿå¤ªç¹ç‘£ã€å¤ªç´¯äºº …

GitHub æœ‰æä¾› api æ–¹å¼å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œé€™æ¬¡ä½¿ç”¨ shell script æ–¹å¼åˆªé™¤

ä¸ä¸€å®šè¦ä½¿ç”¨ shell scriptï¼Œåªè¦èƒ½å¤ ç™¼è«‹æ±‚çš„è©±ï¼Œå³å¯é”æˆç›®çš„

å»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹ shell script

touch delete.sh
chmod u+x delete.sh

#!/usr/bin/env bash

token='<your-github-token>'

repos=(
    'username/repo-1'
    'username/repo-2'
    'username/repo-3'
)

for i in ${repos[@]} ; do
    curl -X DELETE https://api.github.com/repos/${i} -H "Authorization: token ${token}"
    echo "delete https://github.com/${i}";
done

Github API ç›¸é—œæ–‡ä»¶

  • æ–‡ä»¶
  • Authentication æ–¹å¼
  • å¯ç”¨çš„ scope

ç”¢ç”Ÿ Github token

item.title: Proxy ä»£ç†
item.description: Positive Proxy æ­£å‘ä»£ç† æ­£å‘ä»£ç†æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹ä½æ–¼ client å’Œ server ä¹‹é–“çš„ä»£ç†ä¼ºæœå™¨ï¼Œclient å‘ä»£ç†ä¼ºæœå™¨ç™¼é€ä¸€å€‹è«‹æ±‚ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”æŒ‡å®š serverï¼Œä»£ç†å‘ server è½‰äº¤ä¸¦ä¸”å°‡ç²å¾—çš„å…§
item.content:
Positive Proxy æ­£å‘ä»£ç†

  • æ­£å‘ä»£ç†æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹ä½æ–¼ client å’Œ server ä¹‹é–“çš„ä»£ç†ä¼ºæœå™¨ï¼Œclient å‘ä»£ç†ä¼ºæœå™¨ç™¼é€ä¸€å€‹è«‹æ±‚ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”æŒ‡å®š serverï¼Œä»£ç†å‘ server è½‰äº¤ä¸¦ä¸”å°‡ç²å¾—çš„å…§å®¹è¿”å›çµ¦ clientã€‚
  • client éœ€è¦è¨­å®šå‘å“ªè‡ºä»£ç†ä¼ºæœå™¨ç™¼è«‹æ±‚ã€‚
  • æ­£å‘ä»£ç†æ˜¯ä»£ç† client ç«¯ï¼Œç‚º client ç™¼è«‹æ±‚ï¼Œä½¿å¾—çœŸå¯¦ client å°ä¼ºæœå™¨ä¸å¯è¦‹ã€‚
  • æ­£å‘ä»£ç†ä¸­ï¼Œproxy å’Œ client åŒå±¬ä¸€å€‹ LANï¼Œå° server é€æ˜ã€‚

Reverse Proxy åå‘ä»£ç†

  • åå‘ä»£ç†å°æ–¼ client ä¾†èªªï¼Œåå‘ä»£ç†å°±å¥½åƒ serverã€‚
  • client å‘åå‘ä»£ç†ä¼ºæœå™¨ç™¼é€è«‹æ±‚ï¼Œæ¥è‘—åå‘ä»£ç†ä¼ºæœå™¨åˆ¤æ–·è«‹æ±‚èµ°å‘ä½•è™•ï¼Œä¸¦å°‡è«‹æ±‚è½‰äº¤çµ¦ clientï¼Œä½¿å¾—é€™äº›å…§å®¹å°±å¥½ä¼¼ä»–è‡ªå·±ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œclient ä¸¦ä¸æœƒçŸ¥é“åå‘ä»£ç†å¾Œé¢çš„æœå‹™ï¼Œä¹Ÿå› æ­¤ä¸éœ€è¦ client åšä»»ä½•è¨­ç½®ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦æŠŠåå‘ä»£ç†ä¼ºæœå™¨ç•¶æˆçœŸæ­£çš„ server å°±å¥½äº†ã€‚
  • åå‘ä»£ç†æ˜¯ä»£ç† server ç«¯ï¼Œç‚º server æ”¶ç™¼è«‹æ±‚ï¼Œä½¿çœŸå¯¦ server å° client ä¸å¯è¦‹ã€‚
  • åå‘ä»£ç†ä¸­ï¼Œproxy å’Œ server åŒå±¬ä¸€å€‹ LANï¼Œå° client é€æ˜ã€‚

item.content:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

An apple is a sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree (Malus pumila). Apple trees are cultivated worldwide, and are the most widely grown species in the genus Malus. The tree originated in Central Asia, where its wild ancestor, Malus sieversii, is still found today. Apples have been grown for thousands of years in Asia and Europe, and were brought to North America by European colonists. Apples have religious and mythological significance in many cultures, including Norse, Greek and European Christian traditions.1

Inline stylesï¼š

strong, emphasis, strong and emphasis,code, underline, strikethrough, ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤£, $\LaTeX$, X^2^, H~2~O, ==highlight==, Link, and image:

Headings:

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
Heading 6

Table:

Left-Aligned Center Aligned Right Aligned
col 3 is some wordy text $1600
col 2 is centered $12
zebra stripes are neat $1

Lists:

  • Unordered list item 1.
  • Unordered list item 2.
  1. ordered list item 1.
  2. ordered list item 2.
    • sub-unordered list item 1.
    • sub-unordered list item 2.
      • something is DONE.
      • something is NOT DONE.

Syntax Highlighting:

var num1, num2, sum
num1 = prompt("Enter first number")
num2 = prompt("Enter second number")
sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add"
alert("Sum = " + sum)  // "+" means combine into a string

  1. From https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple ↩︎
